    Paydiant Inc.

      • activateOffer

        Returns:

      • removeOffer

        boolean removeOffer(String offerUri)
        Removes the offer.
        Parameters:
        offerUri - the offer uri
        Returns:
        true, if successful

      • retrieveAvailableOfferCampaignsSummary

        OfferCampaignSummaryList retrieveAvailableOfferCampaignsSummary(OfferCampaignSummaryFilterParameters campaignFilterParameters)
        Retrieves summarized(lite) details of available offer campaigns.
        Parameters:
        campaignFilterParameters - Filtering parameter for offer campaigns.
        Returns:
        Summarized list of offer campaigns.
        Throws:
        PaydiantException - - Refer to IOfferManagerService.retrieveAvailableOfferCampaignsSummary(OfferCampaignSummaryFilterParameters) for the relevant exceptions & error codes.
        Since:
        5.5.0.1
        See Also:
        IOfferManagerService.retrieveAvailableOfferCampaignsSummary(OfferCampaignSummaryFilterParameters)

      • retrieveOffersSummary

        OfferSummaryList retrieveOffersSummary(OfferSummaryFilterParameters offerFilterParameters)
        Retrieves summarized(lite) details of user offers.
        Parameters:
        offerFilterParameters - Filtering parameter for offers.
        Returns:
        Summarized list of offers.
        Throws:
        PaydiantException - - Refer to IOfferManagerService.retrieveOffersSummary(OfferSummaryFilterParameters) for the relevant exceptions & error codes.
        Since:
        5.5.0.1

      • retrieveAvailableOfferCampaignWithAcceptancePartners

        OfferCampaign retrieveAvailableOfferCampaignWithAcceptancePartners(String offerCampaignURI)
        Retrieves details of an available offer campaign with acceptance partners details.
        Parameters:
        offerCampaignURI - URI of the offer campaign.
        Returns:
        the available offer campaign with acceptance partners.
        Throws:
        PaydiantException - - Refer to IOfferManagerService.retrieveAvailableOfferCampaignWithAcceptancePartners(String) for the relevant exceptions & error codes.
        Since:
        5.5.0.1
        See Also:
        IOfferManagerService.retrieveAvailableOfferCampaignWithAcceptancePartners(String)

      • retrieveOfferWithAcceptancePartners

        Offer retrieveOfferWithAcceptancePartners(String offerURI)
        Retrieves details of an offer with acceptance partners details.
        Parameters:
        offerURI - URI of the offer.
        Returns:
        offer details with acceptance partners.
        Throws:
        PaydiantException - - Refer to IOfferManagerService.retrieveOfferWithAcceptancePartners(String) for the relevant exceptions & error codes.
        Since:
        5.5.0.1
        See Also:
        IOfferManagerService.retrieveOfferWithAcceptancePartners(String)
